protein.specific_function: Involved in the maintenance of Golgi structure by interacting with giantin, affecting protein transport between the endoplasmic reticulum and Golgi. Involved in hormone-induced steroid biosynthesis in testicular Leydig cells

reference.reference_text: Sohda M, Misumi Y, Yamamoto A, Yano A, Nakamura N, Ikehara Y: Identification and characterization of a novel Golgi protein, GCP60, that interacts with the integral membrane protein giantin. J Biol Chem. 2001 Nov 30;276(48):45298-306. Epub 2001 Oct 5.
